name: Jules
description:
Jules plays many low-cost birds with [area=Fleeting][img=kw-Fleeting][/area], that fly away once played. This leaves your deck light as a feather in the late game, making it easy to consistently draw your higher cost cards round after round.

Their honest and unapologetic nature is reflected in the birds being clearly [area=Visible][img=kw-Visible][/area] to your opponent, making it difficult for you to deceive them.

name: Adonis
description:
Adonis plays fiery cards that leave behind [color=#FABD5D][area=_Ashes]Ashes[/area][/color] in your discard pile, fueling explosive plays like [color=#FABD5D][area=_Veteran]Veteran[/area][/color] in the mid-game. Once you hit 12 cards in your discard pile, you can play [color=#FABD5D][area=_Death]Death[/area][/color] for free, followed in the same round by [color=#FABD5D][area=_Cling]Cling[/area][/color] to keep the combo going for many rounds in a row.

Try to win as fast as possible, since once your deck runs out you'll be left with a discard pile full of [color=#FABD5D][area=_Ashes]Ashes[/area][/color] that will be shuffled to form a pretty bad deck.

name: Mia
description:
Mia spends the early game playing [color=#FABD5D][area=_Dagger]Daggers[/area][/color] instead of points, disrupting and controlling the opponent to enable powerful [color=#FABD5D][area=_Shadow]Shadows[/area][/color] to come out later. The more the opponent struggles, the fewer cards they will have left, and all their points can be wiped away with a well timed [color=#FABD5D][area=_Hurricane]Hurricane[/area][/color].

Once the opponent's hand is in shambles, play [color=#FABD5D][area=_Oak]Oak[/area][/color] to gain tons of [area=Nourish][img=kw-Nourish][/area]. Making it impossible for the opponent to wrest back control.

name: Kitz
description:
Kitz just wants to be together with his beloved [color=#FABD5D][area=_Pet]Pet[/area][/color]! His whole world revolves around finding her with [color=#FABD5D][area=_Night Vision]Night Vision[/area][/color], then seeing her grow strong with [area=Nourish][img=kw-Nourish][/area].

Once she's been played, he can't stand to be without her. Ensure that nothing gets on top of her in your discard pile, then play [color=#FABD5D][area=_Hold Tight]Hold Tight[/area][/color] to get her back time and time again!
